GET/api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api (this .json file

GET/api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET/api/articles/:article_id.queries: any integer with an existing article

GET/api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

queries.any other column: will accept any other valid column name as an argument, however valid values for each column will need to be added to the validQueries list (which prevents SQL injection) in order to filter further

GET/api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: returns an array of comments for given article id
GET/api/articles/:article_id/comments.queries: any integer with an existing article

POST/api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts the submitted comment body and returns that body if successfully posted
POST/api/articles/:article_id/comments.queries: any integer with an existing article

PATCH/api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article by article id, changing the number of votes depending on the body

Delete/api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment by comment id, returning no body on a 204 if successful
Delete/api/comments/:comment_id.queries: any integer with an existing comment
